text: @MarkRuffalo @realDonaldTrump Mark, Please just call it racism. Xenophobia is only an accurate term during the 1st wave of immigration centuries ago. Asian Americans have been part of the US for centuries and xeno means stranger/foreign. I wrote a longer explanation here https://t.co/JccVyloMTn
